website_summaries.verdict: Smart design in an HDPE bucket for carrying extremely heavy items.
pros: Bucket has a sturdy grip handle at the bottom, so you can safely handle the bucket when it's completely full or to dump out the contents
4 buckets contained in the kit, so it gives you a good value
Has a 90-mil thickness level, which allows these buckets to be stacked on top of one another
cons: Could use additional ribs at the top for sturdiness

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing wood pellets for smoking
customer_reviews.text: I use these buckets along with Gamma-Seal lids to store my wood pellets with my smoker. The handle on the bottom makes it very easy to control a pour of pellets into the hopper of the smoker. Highly recommend these just because of the bottom handle. These do NOT come with lids, i added lids, please do not let my picture deceive you.
customer_reviews.author: StandardShipping

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made and Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy but well made and sturdy. I purchased another different bucket from a local store for half the price and the quality was just not there. The plastic material was very thin compared to this Hudson Exchange which is worth the extra money. The handle feature on the bottom is a plus especially when emptying this large bucket. Overall a nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: The bottom handle saves the day (and my shoulder)
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a compost bucket, which gets pretty heavy when it's full. The bottom handle makes emptying it so much easier. Ordered it with the overpriced "Gamma Seal Lid" which works great. Take note that the part of the lid that goes on the bucket is very hard to put on. Had to wail on it with a hammer. Once on, works great.
customer_reviews.author: bike4life

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality bucket
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I am using it to hold 5 gallon of shower water when I am out in my van away from home. I added one of the Gamma seal lids so that the bucket is sealed and leak proof. This bucket is much sturdier than the cheap buckets you find at Lowes. Cheap buckets are fine for light weight non liquid stuff, but this bucket covers my heavy wet stuff storage needs way better.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Hudson 5 gallon bucket with Bottom Grip Handle
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing product ... when you need to have total control of the liquid you are pouring out of this bucket, you won't find anything better than this for use with 5 gallon capacity .. that bottom grip gives you total control of the bucket while pouring ... no more bottom ring slipping out of your fingers ... worse yet, no more bottom lip cracking or breaking from you holding onto it while pouring .. we now have several of these in use, and plan on ordering more in the immediate future
customer_reviews.author: Dean C

customer_reviews.title: Great for gardeners or aquariums
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be a dedicated bucket for my aquariums. It is so much easier to lift over my tall tanks when doing water changes. I am also a garden so will probably purchase another one for garden use. The handle is sturdy enough bit not the greatest. I wouldn't fill it to the top with water and feel confident it won't bend, so I don't, but for my use it is good. The bottom handle makes it completely worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl, Lena's Human

customer_reviews.title: Love the bottom grip
customer_reviews.text: Buckets arrived fast and as described. I love the bottom grip handle. Makes pouring 20 lbs of alfalfa cubes into horse feeders much easier. I got white instead of black so I can mark the inside of bucket for measuring purposes. Would definitely recommend these buckets.
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Geast Bucket with Toe Lift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased bucket and lid together. Needed to preserve contents for additional applications. Bucket and lid allowed me to do this. Liked the toe lift at the bottom of bucket also. Highly recommend both bucket and lid.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Good product I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, practical and according to specifications Fast delivery and good packing
customer_reviews.author: salem omer salem

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I love my bucket
customer_reviews.text: How on earth could I love a *bucket*, let alone write a review for one? But yet again I'm reminded the cheap product is rarely the best value. Dense, solid plastic. Big and tall - exactly the right size for hauling and storage. Most importantly, a handle on the bottom - a feature I never before knew existed but now could not live without. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Very good bucket
customer_reviews.text: Received bucket as described. As soon as I picked it up, I could see and feel the thickness difference between this bucket and $4.00 buckets you find at the chain hardware stores. Filled it up with water and the handle's connection to the bucket seems to be pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JStreet

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bucket!
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the bottom was a great idea - I love it. I'm a 65 year old woman who still loves to garden. These buckets are great for hauling sand/gravel etc. around. I've been using them for a few weeks and they seem very well made. The hand-grip on the bottom is extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Hot shower bucket
customer_reviews.text: Two good uses for this bucket: Warm to hot shower when out camping, hauling wood for the fire, hauling water and the list goes on. Bought this mainly for showering with a siphon pump and having a handle at bottom of bucket makes it useful for dumping out whatever is in the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K

customer_reviews.title: Great Bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Have used it non stop for a few months now while limewashing house and works great! Ordered lid and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Little taller than I expected, but does the job hire for well.
customer_reviews.author: LinJam

customer_reviews.title: Handy handle on bottom of bucket.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than the other ones available, good if you can lift it when full.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pail for homeowners/pet parents. So many uses around the house and yard. Easy to carry handle. Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Tara R

customer_reviews.title: like the bottom handle
customer_reviews.text: Solid. like the bottom handle. great for when you're using gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Urlville

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bucket. Does what it's supposed to. Seems to be pretty durable, and I like the handle on the bottom, which makes it easier when dumping or pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Metz

customer_reviews.title: Great to have a handle
customer_reviews.text: I use these buckets for culturing milk for cheese. The handle is the best thing invented for pouring. Also use a couple for storing and pouring chicken feed.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding grilling/smoking pellets
customer_reviews.text: This bucket does the trick for us. It holds smoking pellets for our Traeger grill. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Geofrey Pejsa

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket, no lids.
customer_reviews.text: I know kids are sold separate but man it would be cool if it was sold together. Either way good buckets. Love the handle on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Made my aquarium water changes a breeze, so easy to dump the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use as a bailing bucket on our dinghy. Luckily haven't had to bail with it yet but if/when we do it'll be perfect. All our sailing friends are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a trash can for my bathroom. Really big, really nice, easy fit in the corner, just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the handle
customer_reviews.text: This will work well when I need to pour things out.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty!
customer_reviews.text: Thick sturdy bucket with handle and a lip at the bottom to hold when emptying the bucket! I bought this bucket to catch water from my AC and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Beth L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a bucket - does not leak so it works ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Theodore S Brahms

customer_reviews.title: We use this bucket to hold our dogs food. ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this bucket to hold our dogs food. I also bought the screw on/off lid to make it easier to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice bucket. I like the handle on the bottom. A little pricey for a bucket
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Bottom isn't flat
customer_reviews.text: Solid bucket, but note that the handle causes the bottom to not be flat. If you're trying to mix something in the bucket like I was, this probably isn't the bucket for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Coutermarsh

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket....
customer_reviews.text: Bucket is great, lip I order did not fit as advertised Better luck next time.
customer_reviews.author: j. duter

customer_reviews.title: Easier pouring good solid buckets
customer_reviews.text: Solid sturdy buckets with the great grab handle at the bottom to help for pouring..
customer_reviews.author: Indiana DIY

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for what I needed. The handle on the bottom is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Bottom handle is very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I used this white bucket to dye fabric. The dye did not discolor the inside of the bucket. The bottom handle is very helpful for someone who is limited on strenth.
customer_reviews.author: Penny G Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Great size bucket! No problmes so far & the bottom handle is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mistake for not reading the fine print
customer_reviews.text: No lids ! The advertised photo had lids with the buckets . My mistake for not reading the fine print
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this here bucket holds so much water and it holds that water so well!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great buckets. Love the handle on the bottom. Should have ordered lids with them. Used for home brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Day

customer_reviews.title: Its a bucket. What else do you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a bucket. What else do you need to know?
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong bucket just wish they made one with 2 handles on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: alan williams

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket. The handle on the bottom helps a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket. The handle on the bottom helps a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the bottom handle
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice when you are lifting and dumping contents of the bucket. You can't really mix anything in these because the cutout gets in the way. But if you mix in something else and then dump into one of these buckets, the bottom handle is really nice. My only reason for not getting 5 stars in that they are still too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: rah

customer_reviews.title: A nice bucket, would be perfect if it came with a lid
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. A nice bucket, would be perfect if it came with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: LR

product_meta.title: Hudson Exchange 5 Gallon Bucket with Bottom Grip Handle, HDPE, White, 4 Pack
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:4 PackThese 5 gallon white hdpe buckets are extremely tough. 90 mil construction allow for these buckets to be used over and over again. Sturdy wire bail with a plastic handgrip is attached to the bucket. Meets standards. Integrated bottom handle allows for easier dumping. Four pack.
feature_bullets: Taller height reduces spillage during filling and capping
Bucket features integrated bottom handle for easy dumping
Traditional wire bail handle with plastic grip attached
Four pack, item contains four buckets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
